resources.string: When you start the application, you can see the menu screen, which will allow us to travel through the screens, it has an exit button from the game, a presentation button where you can get to know me, a preferences button if you want to change something in the application, one that would show the scores on the screen and also the highest. Finally, also a button to Play the game. Words will come out and you have to do what they tell you. press, shake, etc.... you will have points for each correct one and if you make a mistake once the game is over or if you run out of time the juice will end, you will have the option to save your score at the end.
Want the instruction screen to be displayed.
In the future there will be more possibilities of changes, while enjoying what is already.

Hello, this game is created with Android studio. It\'s the Bop-It! Alone, play until you have the most points, if you achieve this you will be in first place among the saved players. This project has its game saved in Room and the options saved with persistence, it has its point variables and information to save such as name, date and time. Also other implementations of art, sounds, music and etc...
